description: The --id flag on bw create exists for test determinism but was visible in --help, which caused agents to discover and use it for human-readable IDs. The flag has been removed from the Flags slice in command.go (hidden from help) while remaining functional in create.go parsing. This ticket tracks that change.

comments.text: We could have a flag in the data structure to suppress printing out something in the help.

title: Hide --id flag from help output
